name: visitable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be visited: The itinerary includes most of the visitable islands. At the time, many journalists were publishing their memoirs of places that later became visitable on package tours.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is hoped that eventually all of the marine sanctuaries will be visitable.Apart from the old town itself, the only visitable attraction is the museum.The house is included in the walking tour, though it is also visitable on your own. Further north, parts of the glacier are visible and visitable.
